title: Milepost GCC: Machine Learning Enabled Self-tuning Compiler

notes.note: Collaboration with IBM (Israel), University of Edinburgh (UK), ARC (now Synopsys, UK), CAPS Entreprise (France), and ICT (China)
MILEPOST GCC software [$#cm_d76ac3bb9a3f744c_38aa288519b38bf7#$]; most of technology is now available in mainline GCC and is being added to major commercial compilers
Considered by IBM to be the first practical machine-learning based compiler in the world (IBM press-release [$#cm_29db2248aba45e59_065ef420f809ff7b#$])
All benchmarks, datasets, tools, models and experimental results have been released to public for collaborative validation and extension!
